column3: â€œThis has been one of the best strains I've ever tasted, smelt, and experienced.  The effects are right up the alley that I look for when smoking.  Induces a immediate relaxed calming feeling, but after about 5-10 minutes you unexpectedly and almost instantaneously start experiencing intense euphoria alongside an initial energetic experience.  Also, expect to feel a warm, tingly, spa-like body buzz take you over after...â€

â€œRight off the bat, the name caught my attention.   So I got a clone and tried it out.  This became one of my favorite plants to grow.  For starters, it only had 1 to 3 leaves on each branch as opposed to the typical 5 or 7.  It started growing the normal ones closer towards the end.  After much research, I was happy to find out that this would have no ill effect.  The buds were really thick and dense.  I was under th...â€

â€œPretty lung expanding. Took about 5-10 mins to kick in and now it feels like I'm swaying back and fourth. I took it for pain and to calm down after a long day. My face is a little numb and tingly. Very uplifting with no paranoia. My mind is pretty clear. Racing thoughts knocked out and I can see that this strain is gonna be a good one for getting to sleep and nighttime pain. It's a keeper!!!â€

â€œVery Strong. Mango hits you hard in the face with a groovy fruit-tasting trip. After four puffs from my MFLB vape, I was lost in it. The CBD from this strong indica slows you down. You will feel strong euphoria and a strong sense of serenity. All the stress or anxiety dissipates with every vape. If you smoke for more than an hour or so, you begin to have psychedelic effects.
The bud itself smells fruity and delicious...â€
â€œWonderful strain. I'm high on it right now, and I can barely type. 5-starsâ€

â€œHmm...May be my new favourite over Blueberry. I don't get the cons of stomach upsets or munchies on Mango vs Blueberry. Nice, relaxed and happy high, and eases you into a restful sleep at a slow pace. Smells and tastes phe-nomanal. Pretty good for social anxiety as the side effects of paranoia or really any side effects at all are minimal if Im gonna be honest. I haven't tried this yet in some of my most anxiety-indu...â€

â€œDamn!!! The citrus flavors of this tropical tasting indica are so prominent that the moment you open the container, your mouth will salivate and crave the tropical fruit. Beautiful buds, and an excellent Indica effect. For me, woke me up and helped me be creative. For others, they may catch a very heavy buzz. Mango is a fantastic strain.â€

â€œMango was my first legit strain to give a good puffin to. I remeber smelling it for my first time and actually thinking it smelt like a mango. Then the taste.. Holy shit it taste like it aswell! Anyway sat down and soaked it in for a good 5 minutes until i felt it creep right up! Had to call a friend and ask him 'what the fuck is happening!' Defiantly hit it to hard. Still my fondest first strain.â€
â€œEXCERPT: The overall feeling of well-being increases (both in body and in mind). However

column1: I vaporized at 205C - 210C and really enjoyed the entire process. The smell when I opened the container. The visual aspect of the buds. The awesome way it grinds up perfectly.
It has a sweet taste and little to no bite at all.

column3: â€œI recently happened upon this strain and had a couple of hits with a newly acquired pub mate. A strong and welcoming high, it is also subtle in its potency and the effect lingered throughout the night. Iâ€™ll have to try more before writing a more definitive account, and look forward to doing so.â€

â€œVaped distillate from a cartridge. Immediate calming effect and increased creativity, as a paranoid person normal tasks were actually easier to focus on. One of the reasons I prefer cartridges and concentrates is the lack of smell that lingers on you. Without that I feel even indica's like mango can be utilized efficiently during the day. 
Also no burnout. The distillate tasted remarkably like mango with that slight ...â€

â€œFavorite indica strains, not a total coucklock, enjoyed walks and softer music, Fresh fall air, very pleasant, not overboard. helped with my depression and stress big time, doesnt make you sleepy, but when youre ready to go to bed its easier to get comfy and fall asleep. also great for pain and anxiety. giggly happiness. definitely would recommendâ€
â€œGood Indica, great taste and smell, truly tastes like candy and Mango in a very good way. Definitely worth a try the taste alone will leave you wanting more!â€

â€œSo sweet and yummy. Total couch lock and I love it. Great for insomnia and anxiety and pain. Sleeping for more than 6 hours in a row. Perfect for migraines, pain, and restless leg syndrome. Not good if you want to be productive. This is something you smoke after a hard day and before  a long shower, and then slither into bed.â€
â€œAmazing indica strain. Slept all night after smoking this. Highly recommended for indica smokers.â€
â€œExtremely high. amazing high!!â€

â€œI've had this mango strain one or twice before but I never remember it tasting as much like mango as this batch does. It is like you just ate a mango. Yeah sure there are strawberry, cherry and countless fruity tasting and smelling flowers but this one definitely takes the cake. The effects are very nice and calming, it's the taste that really impresses me. Wow!â€

â€œThis is a must try for all indications  lovers in my opinion, It doesn't seem to be %100 indica but it's definitely a good indica for people who just want to chill and not wind up locked in paranoia or anything of that sort. Ask any dispensary that has this strain for it, you will remember this strain for real. It is also great to stay in a social state as well so if you would like to smoke up with some friends this ...â€
â€œExtremely high. amazing high!!â€
â€œGood taste. I am an experienced stoner &  would rate this a 6.5 / 10. If you want something really dank  I would look elsewhere  but if youâ€™re looking for a fruity vibe this is the one!â€

â€œThe taste and smell is phenomenal. So fruity and delicious! The high typically lasts me 4 hours and is very pleasant. Smoke goes down very smooth in my one hitter, very little paranoia and low cottonmouth. A very happy and relaxing smoke :)â€
â€œGiggly, happy, no paranoia. Alert but mellow. One of my favourites.â€
â€œVaped a decent amount and also smoked later. Creeper weed for sure. Mid-shelf. Nice tightly trimmed buds. This high helped chill and really enjoy resident evil along with a few xanax. Hellz yea.â€
â€œMango Cough $25 eight 420wellness north 4986 lowell blvd. Denver Coloradoâ€
â€œOne of the best smelling and looking strains ever. The smell is very tropical and fruity. The nugs are surprisingly big. It gets you very stoned but not in a tiring type of way just relaxed.â€

â€œMy favorite bud of all time. Perfect high. You are happy, relaxed, yet you can still get stuff done. Great for pain, stress, appetite, depression. Great smell, taste. I wish I knew where to find this near me.â€

â€œGreat strain for relaxing, sleeping, and relieving pain. Definitely good for those times when you just want to chill. This strain also helped relieve some of the pain I was feeling in my body, which was nice. It also helped me sleep. it's truly an awesome, sleepy, relaxing indica.â€
â€œVaped a decent amount and also smoked later. Creeper weed for sure. Mid-shelf. Nice tightly trimmed buds. This high helped chill and really enjoy resident evil along with a few xanax. Hellz yea.â€
â€œNo bite when you inhale, but the exhale taste sweet. This bud is best when it's ground up, evenly. Joint rolling booduh in my opinion.â€
â€œgreat stone great taste disappointed on length of buzzâ€

â€œThis strain was pretty good. It gave me dry eyes. Its kinda better to smoke alone with this because what happened for me is i was on the internet for like 4 hours while high off this and time goes by slowly so you get to watch everything you want. It also made me real happy and relaxed.â€

â€œThis strain was awesome, the buds were super nice looking, the mix of bright orange hairs with a nicely coated white sugary bud, smelled exactly like mangos when I opened my jar, after smoking exhaling and tasting you could taste the mango, my friends had also agreed with a mango taste. 

A light high, but it lasted roughly 45 minutes to an hour, I would def recommend this to people who love fruity tasting buds and...â€
â€œNo bite when you inhale, but the exhale taste sweet. This bud is best when it's ground up, evenly. Joint rolling booduh in my opinion.â€

â€œThis strain was pretty good. It gave me dry eyes. Its kinda better to smoke alone with this because what happened for me is i was on the internet for like 4 hours while high off this and time goes by slowly so you get to watch everything you want. It also made me real happy and relaxed.â€

â€œGreat strain for relaxing, sleeping, and relieving pain. Definitely good for those times when you just want to chill. This strain also helped relieve some of the pain I was feeling in my body, which was nice. It also helped me sleep. it's truly an awesome, sleepy, relaxing indica.â€
â€œgreat stone great taste disappointed on length of buzzâ€

â€œMy favorite bud of all time. Perfect high. You are happy, relaxed, yet you can still get stuff done. Great for pain, stress, appetite, depression. Great smell, taste. I wish I knew where to find this near me.â€
â€œGreat fruity tasty strain but can get a bit boring if smoked for days on endâ€
â€œWhat a classically melty, couchlocky indica. Heady high and body high in about equal portions, tingly in my face, sleepy, mild euphoria. Does wonders for my anxiety. A perfect bedtime strain.â€
â€œHarsh, very dry crumble.  Pale color, lackluster consistency, and strange aftertaste.  From Shakka Wax" green label.  Would not recommend.â€"

â€œVery mellow and calming, not super powerful however the few times I vaped more than usual I was enjoying a unique stone, not too sleepy, but quite fuzzy and trippy.

The taste is fruity but with a musk that reminds me of sour diesel's aftertaste, I can see where the mango name comes from tho. 

It's not a powerhouse but rather a pleasant mellow strain with a unique flavor and effect.â€
â€œVERY tasty, VERY aromatic, VERY potent high.â€

â€œMango pure joy frees the mind from everyday stress throw on Miles Davis will melt your body. Great for pain and inflammation. Mango is so fragrant will fill room of mango joy.Budz were popcorn glittered out.Taste of deep mango candy w optima mango blunt wrap hard to put down.Deep mango taste exhale was on point nice after taste. Pick it up and put a smile on your face.â€
â€œVery sweet mango with a subtle after taste I can't quite put my mind around.â€

â€œAwesome strain for anxiety :) I like this strain in the evening, after work, and especially when I need a good nights sleep. Iâ€™ve smoked it in the morning but I ended up in a couch lock, so far itâ€™s great for sleep and relaxingâ€
â€œrelaxingâ€

â€œGot this in an oil syringe and vape with a pen. It puts me to sleep, but generally I don't enjoy the experience all that much. In social situations, it makes me feel pretty withdrawn and isn't disengaged.â€
â€œNice mellow indica. Lightly sweet taste with a mellow body buzz. Good daytime strain.â€

â€œAwesome strain for anxiety :) I like this strain in the evening, after work, and especially when I need a good nights sleep. Iâ€™ve smoked it in the morning but I ended up in a couch lock, so far itâ€™s great for sleep and relaxingâ€

It's not a powerhouse but rather a pleasant mellow strain with a unique flavor and effect.â€

â€œPurchased over the weekend. Very distinct smell and taste. deffinitely indica . High didn't last as long as I hoped but it was great for muscle spasms . Gets the job well done : )  7 out of 10 good bud.â€

â€œVery relaxing Bud. Makes you nice and calm, with a tingly vibration throughout your body which radiates relaxation throughout your every  cell.

Tastes just like the name.

Very good for pain, anxiety, stress, tension. 5/5â€
â€œrelaxingâ€

With the THC popping around 21% the inhale has no bite. With a sweet exhale this booduh is best ground up, and rolled into a doobie.

ThePinkGoat....out!â€

â€œI have smoked here and there since I was young but tbh I really got turned off to smoking because I have pretty severe anxiety and the majority of the time I end up getting a paranoid buzz that ends up just inducing MORE anxiety but I tried this strain for the first time & I am literally amazed. I got all the effects I wanted and none of the bad ones. I felt happy, calm, relaxed & it pretty much immediately took away...â€
â€œSweet, smooth smoke. Comfortable, playful/silly, happy.â€
â€œGreat fruity tasty strain but can get a bit boring if smoked for days on endâ€
â€œSmooth mango flavor with an amazing head burn that makes my eyebrows rise and my eyes squint. Relieves pressure behind eyes and makes spacing out very easy.â€

â€œGot this in an oil syringe and vape with a pen. It puts me to sleep, but generally I don't enjoy the experience all that much. In social situations, it makes me feel pretty withdrawn and isn't disengaged.â€

â€œOne of my all time favorites! Smells like actual mango with a hint of pineapple to me. Very citrusy. Fat, dense buds and my grinder collects a lot of kief from this leaf. My favorite is GDP. I'd love a cross between Mango & GDP. That could be perfection.

Effects? Immediately tasty. Calmness takes over a few minutes in. Two good pulls and I was where I needed to be but enjoyed it so much I kept puffing. Can't wait to...â€
â€œIt was perfect for watching funny TV shows. All my muscles felt great when slightly stretched. Went extremely hungry, sadly.â€

â€œmy favorite strain so far. Kinda a creeper, and I was starting to think it was weak but when it kicked in my pain faded and it was time to relax. good night time strain and after about 45 min I was ready to hit the pillow. long lasting too, I did not wake up all night.â€

â€œOne of my all time favorites! Smells like actual mango with a hint of pineapple to me. Very citrusy. Fat, dense buds and my grinder collects a lot of kief from this leaf. My favorite is GDP. I'd love a cross between Mango & GDP. That could be perfection.

Effects? Immediately tasty. Calmness takes over a few minutes in. Two good pulls and I was where I needed to be but enjoyed it so much I kept puffing. Can't wait to...â€

â€œWow. I thought my weedman was just telling me a random strain name (you know, because some dealers in non-rec states do that) so I would be more inclined to buy it thinking it was fire. I was skeptical because it didn't smell that strong. But holy shit, when I took that first pull off the pipe, I knew it was in fact Mango. The fruity taste, smooth smoke, and euphoric feeling afterward was enough to make me a believer...â€
â€œit's a good strain..it's like jillybean and tangie..that mango smell and taste is a huge plus..you get stoned..eye dry and a good long highâ€

â€œPurchased over the weekend. Very distinct smell and taste. deffinitely indica . High didn't last as long as I hoped but it was great for muscle spasms . Gets the job well done : )  7 out of 10 good bud.â€
â€œVery sweet mango with a subtle after taste I can't quite put my mind around.â€

â€œVery mellow and calming, not super powerful however the few times I vaped more than usual I was enjoying a unique stone, not too sleepy, but quite fuzzy and trippy.

The taste is fruity but with a musk that reminds me of sour diesel's aftertaste, I can see where the mango name comes from tho. 

It's not a powerhouse but rather a pleasant mellow strain with a unique flavor and effect.â€

â€œMango was a light Indica / heavy Hybrid (Indica side) in effects to me. The smell and taste was lightly sweet & fruity. Looks of the buds I had were nothing to mention about one way or the other. The strain has been around since the 60's (updated" in 91). Received Third Place in the Indica category during the 02 High Times Cannabis Cup. Worth a try for sure :)â€"

â€œmy favorite strain so far. Kinda a creeper, and I was starting to think it was weak but when it kicked in my pain faded and it was time to relax. good night time strain and after about 45 min I was ready to hit the pillow. long lasting too, I did not wake up all night.â€

â€œThis strain has a fantastic smell right off the bat and has the taste to match.  A very rich mango flavor when I used it in my bubbler.  The nugs where very large (about 2 - 4 grams a nug) and super frosty.  Not sure what nutrients the grower used but this strain is amazing.  Instant head high with a creeping body indica high that comes from high CBD strains.  Great after a long day of work.â€

With the THC popping around 21% the inhale has no bite. With a sweet exhale this booduh is best ground up, and rolled into a doobie.

ThePinkGoat....out!â€
â€œThis strain smells delicious and really relaxes you completely. Nice for an Indica but I prefer a good sativa any day. Made me horny lol.â€
â€œwell done overallâ€

â€œIï¸ smoke heavy but this is a soothing yet strong strain that tastes as good as it smells. Highly recommended to those with add/adhd and depression. Iï¸ sing and rap and Iâ€™ve come up with some great ideas while under the influence of this stain. It kept me cool calm and collected!!!â€

â€œHaving almost 30 years experience in the field, I never messed with autos..
I started the seed 9.1.18 , two weeks later I put it in a 5 gallon bag and brought it outside, I harvested 11.1.18 , didn't get much at all..
However, being my first auto I was not aware of the low yield.
Nevermind the yield, it is very potent!! 4 puffs, I'm good. I had purple punch & cream caramel and negra 44, mango is better than all the o...â€
â€œAs far as taste, this is the best one I've tried so far.  Vaping it is actually like getting a taste of mango.  It's good for headaches.  Clear headed high.â€
â€œAwesome Relaxing Flower..Kicked me back good and was awesome on my Spinal Stenosis Pain..â€
â€œNot one of my favourite strains. Heavy in the couch feeling. Would not take this out with friends or to concerts and stuff like that.â€
â€œChilled out but still motivated, got the best sleep too. My buddies and I got the giggles while playing golf.â€
â€œVery interestingâ€

â€œWow..... This is the best feeling ever to just lay down and FEEL it. I feel like rain is dripping on me my body is buzzing. It feels really cold and then kinda hot. It's 1:1 THC and CBD so this is the best ever. Not sure if it would be good around the public but wow... I feel beautifulâ€

â€œThis is my favorite strain by far. I prefer it for the gym, especially yoga or long walks which pairs phenomenally with music. It gives me an energized inner calm that helps me live in the moment and get through my day with little to no come down (which is a miracle because of my BPD, a living hell)  Did I mention taste? Delicious mango, with the calm of walking on the beach in tropical paradise.â€

â€œI was surprised how much I liked Mango. I don't know if I agree with the flavor being as specific as a mango. Certainly fruity but maybe the concept or idea of a piece of fruit, not any Mango I've eaten at least. Very delicious none the less. Mango was very helpful when relaxing and falling to sleep. I could do without the need to constantly talk. Seriously consideringâ€‹ buying a clone of this strain.â€
â€œVery aromatic! Helped a lot with my insomnia and anxiety.â€

â€œThe taste is just awesome, mango like.
But is not that strong as silver haze or super skunk, 7 rate overallâ€

â€œVia OCS I ordered 3.5 grams of Canaca's Mango. Just as it was with the White Widow I had ordered at the same time, upon receipt the flower was in perfect condition. I noted that the label indicated a higher THC% than I was expecting (over 20%) so I was concerned about how hard this might hit me, but the effect was manageable. Still I don't think you'll be getting much work done after smoking this, so free up your sch...â€
â€œSo Clear and focused. Just gotta get s#$% done.â€

â€œI'm pretty sure i just got a quality sample but this was some of the best bud i've  ever smoked. It was actually called Mango Dream. Got Completely high from 1 skimp joint. Only smoked for about 6 minutes and i was G.O.N.E. Not necessarily ecstatic but i was most definitely uplifted. Great bud.â€
â€œSmell like fruity for sure! Very fresh hit but the stoning effect is a hard hit. Very sedative, it knocked me out for 3 hours hard. Would recommend it if really want to sleep.â€

â€œI go for indica dominant strains due to lower back pressure and headaches and Mango did the trick on both parts. First toke was amazing mango, almost a sweet orange flavor and not really harsh at all on the exhale. The flavor alone had my curiosity piqued but after about the third hit, I was  feeling the heavy indica effect that comes with this strain. Body pain melted away, pressure was relieved and, after my tooth ...â€
â€œSuper relaxing, has a sweet mango smell to it. Makes my eyes feel very heavy hahaâ€

â€œfeel less high in my head and have relaxed feelings of happiness
enchanting music feelâ€

â€œDense mango smelling nugs like a tropical Kush smell.. Very great high just the high tends to go down quicker than other strains but overall great high and the way it smells is the way the exhale or mango sweet exhaleâ€

â€œAphria's Mango is what I've had the most success with in getting a full nights sleep. Chronic back pain and PTSD had me up several times through the night. And anyone suffering from lack of sleep knows how that affects your entire well being. A few hits about 2 hours before bed and I'm out for 8 or 9 hours. Thank God  I found it!â€
â€œexcellent experience very relaxing and great taste!â€

â€œI purchased some Lambs Bread Mango by Dama from Green Leaf today and thought it was spectacular! I smoked it a bit later in the day and it gave me plenty of energy to do everything I needed to get done. The taste wasn't amazing but I felt the high after 2 hits and shortly after felt in a much better mood. Very satisfied.â€

â€œI could not stop laughing after smoking this. Everything seemed so much funnier than normal, kind of like how you felt when you first started smoking. I felt euphoric and jazzed about life. Not as much of a couch-lock effect with this strain, although I did feel relaxed and stayed glued to the couch watching a movie anyway. A+ strain.â€
â€œBy far my favorite strain. Extremely relaxed and chill mood. I did get a bit dizzy but felt very happy and cheerful. One hit is all you need.â€
â€œgreat for right before bed! puts me in the best sleep of my life! love the mango, sweet taste. makes me happy & laughy.â€

â€œThis one knocked my ass out, put me down for the 10 count, the old left right goodnight. I was sleeping soundly within 30 minutes, sleeping with my jelly muscles and goofy smiles. Also munchies are a thing. 

Perfect relaxing strain, reminds me why I love marijuana so muchâ€
â€œvery goodâ€

U can feel where itâ€™s going to start my head starts tingling and it feels king of good. It does come on slowly then hits hard when it really kicks in then about 10 minutes in I think if I have this correct you get hit hard again ...â€
